column2: "So... Loser has finally shown itself. We'll begin transferring you to the location of this Dark Falz shortly."
"Once the battle begins, there's nothing more I can do for you... I'll be here, hoping you all return safely... Give 'em hell."

"These readings from the infested
mothership are off the charts. Dark
Falz Loser is just waiting for us. You'll
likely be fighting in its domain, so we don't
know what might happen. Retreat may
not be an option. Still, we have to take
it out for good.

――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Be defeated in the final area, time limit expires."
